summary.overallFindings: CBRE Group, Inc. demonstrates comprehensive responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with detailed and verifiable public evidence supporting transparency, fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, governance, and external audit commitments. The company provides concrete examples of bias mitigation, explainable AI, and robust governance frameworks, as well as clear documentation of privacy and security protocols. Public filings and reports further reinforce CBRE's commitment to accountability and external oversight. Overall, CBRE's responsible AI approach is mature and well-documented, with no significant gaps identified.
